thread.title: Kim Kardashian Reveals She Lied to Kanye West About Cleaning Out Her Closet
thread.title_full: Kim Kardashian Reveals She Lied to Kanye West About Cleaning Out Her Closet

author: Cosmopolitan.com
title: Kim Kardashian Reveals She Lied to Kanye West About Cleaning Out Her Closet
text:
Remember that Keeping Up With the Kardashians episode a few years ago, where Kim Kardashian's husband Kanye West raided her closet to "update" her look?
Yeah, people couldn't understand the big clearout at the time either ‚Äî but now it seems that Kim actually sneakily kept everything they "got rid" of, storing it in a second closet so the couple's daughter North will have all of her mother's clothes when she's older.
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below All in 1 video! Follow @KimKardashianSnap for more!
A video posted by Kim Kardashian Snapchats üçë (@kimkardashiansnap) on Feb 11, 2017 at 10:34am PST
In a series of videos Kim posted on Snapchat, she gave fans a tour of her "second archive," showing meticulously organized and painstakingly labeled items from her sartorial past.
"Do you guys remember this stuff?" she asked, thumbing through dresses she wore to awards shows and on the cover of magazines, knowing exactly when and where she had worn each item. She pointed out the dress she wore on the cover of Vogue and to the Grammys, as well as items she wore to a Prince concert and "in Paris one time."
She also showed fans a rail heaving with clothes that had been made for her that she had never even worn.
"The fun part is I kept everything ‚Äî all for memories," she said.
"Even when Kanye thought he cleaned out my closet, I kept it all secretly for my daughter one day," she laughed.
family
A photo posted by Kim Kardashian West (@kimkardashian) on Jan 3, 2017 at 10:56am PST
Kim only recently returned to social media after she was the victim of an armed robbery in Paris last year, but hopefully she sticks around if it means more stories like this.
From: Digital Spy
